qas.question: What day was the Olympic torch lit for the 2008 games?
When did the Olympic torch reach Beijing?
How many continents did the torch visit after Beijing?

Where was the Olympic torch lit?

context: After being lit at the birthplace of the Olympic Games in <a1_0><a5_0>Olympia, Greece<a5_0/><a1_0/> on <a0_0><a6_0>March 24<a6_0/><a0_0/>, the torch traveled to the <a7_0>Panathinaiko Stadium<a7_0/> in Athens, and then to Beijing, arriving on <a2_0><a8_0>March 31<a2_0/>.<a8_0/> From Beijing, the torch was following a route passing through <a3_0>six<a3_0/> continents. The torch has visited cities along the <a4_0>Silk Road<a4_0/>, symbolizing ancient links between China and the rest of the world. The relay also included an ascent with the flame to the top of <a9_0>Mount Everest<a9_0/> on the border of Nepal and Tibet, China from the Chinese side, which was closed specially for the event.
